Guide:

This guide is intended for readers familiar with at least some the technologies involved.

Technologies used in this Guide:

  • AWS

    • Lambda & API Gateway
    • DynamoDb
    • Cognito
    • S3
    • Route 53
    • CloudFront
    • Certificate Manager
  • Serverless
  • React
  • ReactStrap
  • React Router
  • Github
  • NodeJS
  • IOT - Automate app for android

For a more in-depth guide to creating a Serverless web app, Serverless Stack I canâ€™t recommend this guide enough, it was super helpful for me in starting this project.

The steps are layed out in the recommend sequence, however not all steps are strictly sequential. Reader discretion is advised.

Sign up for AWS (Amazon Web Services) account

For this Project we will be using AWS as our cloud provider, the project is scoped for AWS Free Usage Tier, so if you are new to AWS, your cloud cost should be minimal.

  1. Sign up here

Register Domain Name from AWS - Route 53

We will be using Route 53 for registering our domain name and for handling our DNS.

Install Tools

  • Node.js
  • VS Code

Clone Project Repo

npm install scooterShare
